# An example song using mono 8-bit sounds

Song:
  Tempo: 120
  Structure:
    - Verse:   x2
    - Chorus:  x4
    - Verse:   x2
    - Chorus:  x4
  Kit:
    - bass:       ../../sounds/bass_mono_8.wav
    - snare:      ../../sounds/snare_mono_8.wav
    - hh_closed:  ../../sounds/hh_closed_mono_8.wav
    - agogo:      ../../sounds/agogo_high_mono_8.wav
    - tom_high:   ../../sounds/tom4_mono_8.wav
    - tom_low:    ../../sounds/tom2_mono_8.wav

Verse:
  - bass:       X...X...X...X...
  - snare:      ..............X.
  - hh_closed:  X.XXX.XXX.X.X.X.
  - agogo:      ..............XX

Chorus:
  - bass:       X...X...XX..X...
  - snare:      ....X.......X...
  - hh_closed:  X.XXX.XXX.XX..X.
  - tom_high:   ...........X....
  - tom_low:    ..............X.
